pr_title: :bug: switch default value to empty string

timeline.message: switch default value to empty string

timeline.bodyText: My preference would be to do a null check further on rather than set this to an empty string. I say this because if via the ReST API we set it to null then we easily break the plugin. What do you think @aldebaran30701 ?
timeline.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: Good point, I'm adding a check to it instead. I'll test it and push the change in a moment. 👍
replies.author: aldebaran30701

timeline.message: :bug: add null check to string value
